root.cn: 这是一款平板上专为儿童精心设计的早教学习软件， 玩法简单，只要猜出图片中动物，水果，蔬菜，花卉，交通工具等的名字即可,可以大幅提高宝宝识别生活中常见的事物，同时也可以提高对汉字的学习，是妈妈们早教的好帮手！宝宝们赶快来体验吧！
root.en: This is an early childhood learning software specially designed for children on the Pad. Play simple, as long as you guess the names of animals, fruits, vegetables, flowers, transportation and so on in the picture, can greatly improve the baby's recognition of common things in life, but also can improve the learning of Chinese characters, is a good helper for mothers to teach early! Babies come to experience it!
